( Carnage: That explination sounds saticfactory, I.R., and thank you for the commenst on how I handle my characters. But please make sure that such a mistake does not happen in the future.
I would like to take this time to notify the RPGers that I regret having to take up your message space with this dispute. It seems to have cleared up a bit now.
I will post my characters shortly.
Thank you for your time.)
